title: Cabinet Drafter - 2020 Design Software
job_overview:
We are seeking a skilled Remote Cabinet Drafter.

If you possess the qualifications, please apply using the form provided below.
 Upgrade to see actual info





 This position offers the flexibility of remote work while contributing to high-quality kitchen and cabinet design projects. Our client specializes in custom cabinetry for residential and commercial spaces, serving customers nationwide.

Key Responsibilities
Design Development: Create detailed cabinet layouts and production drawings from architectural plans using 2020 Design software

Technical Documentation: Generate comprehensive specifications, cut lists, and material requirements

Project Coordination: Collaborate with project managers, designers, and production teams to ensure seamless workflow

Quality Assurance: Review drawings for accuracy, compliance with building codes, and manufacturing feasibility

Client Support: Assist with design revisions and technical questions throughout project lifecycle

Timeline Management: Meet project deadlines while maintaining high-quality standards

Required Qualifications
Technical Skills
Proficiency in 2020 Design software (minimum 2 years experience)

Experience with cabinet manufacturing processes and construction methods

Ability to read and interpret architectural drawings and blueprints

Knowledge of wood species, hardware, and cabinet construction techniques

Additional Software (Preferred)
Cabinet Vision

AutoCAD

Chief Architect

SketchUp

Experience & Education
Minimum 2 years computer-aided drafting experience in millwork or cabinet industry

High school diploma or GED required (technical school/college preferred)

Previous remote work experience preferred
